answer: <p>I had the same problem, I was getting an invalid ModelState when I tried to post the form. For me, this was caused by setting CategoryId to int, when I changed it to string the ModelState was valid and the Create method worked as expected.</p>
<p>In my case the first ID in my list was zero, once I changed the ID to start from 1, it worked.</p>
